title: Eventide
summaries: The Eventide is a Hardmode, post-Plantera bow that, when consuming Wooden Arrows as ammo, autofires five rainbow-colored Twilight Lance projectiles, with one of the lances dealing 200% or double the weapon's base damage (100 damage). When using other arrows, one of the five shots fired by the bow will be converted into a Twilight Lance that also deals double the base damage. Twilight Lances can pierce up to four enemies. The Eventide has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by the Empress of Light.

statistics.Sell: 5 GC
